scripts.docs: yarn docs:clean && yarn docs:docgen && yarn docs:mkdocs
scripts.docs:docgen: cd docs && solidity-docgen -i ../contracts -o md-build -t solidity-docgen-templates && cp ../*.md md-build && mv md-build/stableCoin/standalone/* md-build/stableCoin && rm -r md-build/stableCoin/standalone/
scripts.docs:mkdocs:serve: yarn docs:docgen && cd docs && mkdocs serve
